profile.name: Sivasankar Sivalingam
profile.title: Senior Frontend Lead | React | Angular
profile.summary: Lead Frontend Engineer with 10+ years of experience in architecting robust enterprise applications for global clients, possessing a diversified skillset in the frontend ecosystem. Proven track record of technical leadership in developing applications in Micro-Frontends (MFE) using React, Module Federation, and Design Systems. Adept in requirement analysis, effort estimation, stakeholder management, and cross-functional collaboration. Highly adaptive and proficient in the Agile Scrum methodology. Passionate about leveraging Generative AI tools to enhance development efficiency and drive innovation in frontend solutions.

responsibilities: Led the design and development of responsive, high-performance web applications for Assisted channels, ensuring scalability and maintainability.

Optimized application performance, accessibility, and cross-browser compatibility to deliver robust user experiences.
Championed Agile practices through sprint planning, backlog grooming, and daily stand-ups, aligning delivery with business objectives.
Explored and integrated Generative AI tools to streamline development workflows, automate repetitive tasks, and boost team productivity.
